text:
@realDonaldTrump Your direct poor response to COVID-19 has led us to this day.  
Explain why YOUR ENTIRE FAMILY votes by mail.   Is it the bone spurs that kept you out of war?
And at no time during WWI or WWII were we at a thread of being killed for going out to vote.  
U R AN IDD E UTT....
